values: It's a shitty day today. Someone decided to call CPS on me for supposedly beating my kids with pans. THe funny thing is is that it was a complaint against me under my maiden name...Which I haven't used in almost 3 YEARS.  Anyway I just wanted to type some shit in order to get it off my chest. I found out that my daughter is partially deaf a while back so now we are trying this new drop. If that doesn't work they're going to do surgery. And if that doesn't work then we're going to have to buy her a hearing aid. Well that's it for now. I'll update more later.

It's been a long ass time since I wrote in here. I honestly forgot I had it until a couple of days ago so I'm going to start posting in here again...hopefully. Well I just wanted to let everyone know why I haven't been writing but I'm going to go to bed so I'll probably update this in better detail tomorrow

Your Values Profile
Loyalty: You value loyalty a fair amount. You're loyal to your friends... to a point. But if they cross you, you will reconsider your loyalties. Staying true to others is important to you, but you also stay true to yourself. Honesty: You value honesty highly. You're unflinchingly honest, even when it's not easy. For you, integrity is very important - in yourself and others. People may not always like what you say, but they know they can trust it. Generosity: You value generosity a fair amount. You are all about giving, as long as there's some give and take. Supportive and kind, you don't mind helping out a friend in need. But you know when you've given too much. You have no problem saying "no"! Humility: You value humility highly. You have the self-confidence to be happy with who you are. And you don't need to seek praise to make yourself feel better. You're very modest, and you're keep the drama factor low. Tolerance: You value tolerance highly. Not only do you enjoy the company of those very different from you... You do all that you can to seek it out interesting and unique friends. You think there are many truths in life, and you're open to many of them.
The Five Factor Values Test
You Are Kermit
Hi, ho! Lovable and friendly, you get along well with everyone you know. You're a big thinker, and sometimes you over think life's problems. Don't worry - everyone know's it's not easy being green. Just remember, time's fun when you're having flies!
The Muppet Personality Test
You Are a Visionary Soul
You are a curious person, always in a state of awareness. Connected to all things spiritual, you are very connected to your soul. You are wise and bright: able to reason and be reasonable. Occasionally, you get quite depressed and have dark feelings. You have great vision and can be very insightful. In fact, you are often profound in a way that surprises yourself. Visionary souls like you can be the best type of friend. You are intuitive, understanding, sympathetic, and a good healer. Souls you are most compatible with: Old Soul and Peacemaker Soul
What Kind of Soul Are You?

Your Five Factor Personality Profile
Extroversion: You have medium extroversion. You're not the life of the party, but you do show up for the party. Sometimes you are full of energy and open to new social experiences. But you also need to hibernate and enjoy your "down time." Conscientiousness: You have high conscientiousness. Intelligent and reliable, you tend to succeed in life. Most things in your life are organized and planned well. But you borderline on being a total perfectionist. Agreeableness: You have medium agreeableness. You're generally a friendly and trusting person. But you also have a healthy dose of cynicism. You get along well with others, as long as they play fair. Neuroticism: You have medium neuroticism. You're generally cool and collected, but sometimes you do panic. Little worries or problems can consume you, draining your energy. Your life is pretty smooth, but there's a few emotional bumps you'd like to get rid of. Openness to experience: Your openness to new experiences is high. In life, you tend to be an early adopter of all new things and ideas. You'll try almost anything interesting, and you're constantly pushing your own limits. A great connoisseir of art and beauty, you can find the positive side of almost anything.
The Five Factor Personality Test

You Are 40% "Average American"
You are average because you don't have a college degree. You are not average since you live more than three miles away from McDonalds.
How "Average American" Are You?
Your Kissing Purity Score: 43% Pure
You're not one to kiss and tell... But word is, you kiss pretty well.
Kissing Purity Test
Your Hidden Talent
You have the power to persuade and influence others. You're the type of person who can turn a whole room around. The potential for great leadership is there, as long as you don't abuse it. Always remember, you have a lot more power over people than you might think!
What's Your Hidden Talent?
Your Scholastic Strength Is Deep Thinking
You aren't afraid to delve head first into a difficult subject, with mastery as your goal. You are talented at adapting, motivating others, managing resources, and analyzing risk. You should major in: Philosophy Music Theology Art History Foreign language
What Should You Major In?

: The problem with LJ: we all think we are so close, but really we know nothing about each other. So I want you to ask me something you think you should know about me. Something that should be obvious, but you have no idea about. Ask away.
Then post this in your LJ and find out what people don't know about you.

Tootsie Roll Pop
It only takes three licks to get to your center!
What Kind of Candy Are You?
You Are a Classic Martini
You area sophisticated drinker, who knows that simple quality is over-rated. You're a knowledgeable drunk, but sometimes you're a know-it-all when you're blasted. You should never: Drink and gossip. You tend to forget who's standing right behind you! Your ideal party: Has a real bartender. But no one mixes a better drink than you. Your drinking soulmates: those with a Chocolate Martini personality Your drinking rivals: those with a Margarita Martini personality
What Flavor Martini Are You?
Your Brain's Pattern
Your brain is always looking for the connections in life. You always amaze your friends by figuring out things first. You're also good at connecting people - and often play match maker. You see the world in fluid, flexible terms. Nothing is black or white.
What Pattern Is Your Brain?
You Are Somewhat Machiavellian
You're not going to mow over everyone to get ahead... But you're also powerful enough to make things happen for yourself. You understand how the world works, even when it's an ugly place. You just don't get ugly yourself - unless you have to!
How Machiavellian Are You?
Your Summer Ride is a Jeep
For you, summer is all about having no responsibilities. You prefer to hang with old friends - and make some new ones.
What's Your Summer Ride?

Take the Seven Deadly Sins Quiz

You Are 33 Years Old
Under 12: You are a kid at heart. You still have an optimistic life view - and you look at the world with awe. 13-19: You are a teenager at heart. You question authority and are still trying to find your place in this world. 20-29: You are a twentysomething at heart. You feel excited about what's to come... love, work, and new experiences. 30-39: You are a thirtysomething at heart. You've had a taste of success and true love, but you want more! 40+: You are a mature adult. You've been through most of the ups and downs of life already. Now you get to sit back and relax.
What Age Do You Act?
Your Heart Is Green
Love completes you, but that doesn't mean you seek it out. When love comes your way, you integrate it peacefully into the rest of you life. Your flirting style: Laid back Your lucky first date: Walking around aimlessly and talking Your dream lover: Is both enthusiastic and calm What you bring to relationships: Balance
What Color Heart Do You Have?
Brainy Kid
In high school, you were acing AP classes or hanging out in the computer lab. You may have been a bit of a geek back then, but now you're a total success!
Who Were You In High School?
How You Life Your Life
You are honest and direct. You tell it like it is. You're laid back and chill, but sometimes you care too much about what others think. You prefer a variety of friends and tend to change friends quickly. You tend to dream big, but you worry that your dreams aren't attainable.
How Do You Live Your Life?

Extra-Cocky Mind
71% mind-love and 25% body-love!
You show an above-average love for your mind and a below-average love for your body.

In effect, you sure think you think good! Your physical self-confidnce is slightly lacking, but in terms of intelligence, you can run circles around super-models.

Just because you refuse to call yourself physically superior doesn't mean you aren't. Many hot people don't see themselves that way. Consider anorexics for example.

Anyway, the smiley face in the below graph indicates where you lie, in a 2-D measure of self-love. I'm continually adjusting the cutoffs. What this means: a "normal" says you really are around the average, and a "cocky" says you really are cockier than most other people. Based on some real-world testing, I have some final advice:
  • don't date someone if your squares are not sharing an edge or corner.
  • friendships more than 2 squares away probably aren't healthy.

Yes! I was joking about anorexicia.



My test tracked 2 variables How you compared to other people your age and gender:
You scored higher than 70% on mind
 You scored higher than 3% on body
Link: The How Much Do You Love Yourself Test written by chicken_pot_pie on Ok Cupid, home of the 32-Type Dating Test

The Keys to Your Heart
You are attracted to those who are unbridled, untrammeled, and free. In love, you feel the most alive when everything is uncertain, one moment heaven... the next moment hell. You'd like to your lover to think you are loyal and faithful... that you'll never change. You would be forced to break up with someone who was ruthless, cold-blooded, and sarcastic. Your ideal relationship is open. Both of you can talk about everything... no secrets. Your risk of cheating is low. Even if you're tempted, you'd try hard not to do it. You think of marriage as something precious. You'll treasure marriage and treat it as sacred. In this moment, you think of love as something you thirst for. You'll do anything for love, but you won't fall for it easily.
What Are The Keys To Your Heart?

Your Seduction Style: Au Natural
You rank up there with your seduction skills, though you might not know it. That's because you're a natural at seduction. You don't realize your power! The root of your natural seduction power: your innocence and optimism. You're the type of person who happily plays around and creates a unique little world. Little do you know that your personal paradise is so appealing that it sucks people in. You find joy in everything - so is it any surprise that people find joy in you? You bring back the inner child in everyone you meet with your sincere and spontaneous ways. Your childlike (but not childish) behavior also inspires others to care for you. As a result, those who you befriend and date tend to be incredibly loyal to you.
What Kind of Seducer Are You?
You Passed the US Citizenship Test
Congratulations - you got 7 out of 10 correct!
Could You Pass the US Citizenship Test?
You Are 90% Boyish and 10% Girlish
You have a tough exterior - and usually a tough interior to match it. You're no nonsense, logical, and very assertive. Sometimes you can't understand women at all, even if you're a woman yourself. You see things rationally, and don't like to let your emotions get the best of you.
How Boyish or Girlish Are You?
You Are Cupid
A total romantic, you're always crushing on a new reindeer. Why You're Naughty: You've caused so much drama, all the reindeers aren't speaking to each other. Why You're Nice: You have a knack for playing matchmaker. You even hooked Rudolph up!
Which of Santa's Reindeer Are You?
You Are Scary
You even scare scary people sometimes!
How Scary Are You?

Dear Santa...

Dear Santa,

This year I've been busy!

In June I saved a busload of nuns in Angola (326 points). Last Saturday I donated bone marrow to in a life-saving procedure (300 points). Last month I caught a purse-snatcher who stole 's purse (30 points). In August I helped across the street (6 points). In January I bought porn for (10 points).

Overall, I've been nice (672 points). For Christmas I deserve a shiny red ball!

Sincerely,
munchkin_kt

Write your letter to Santa! Enter your LJ username:

A lot has been said about how to prevent rape. Women should learn self-defense. Women should lock themselves in their houses after dark. Women shouldn't have long hair and women shouldn't wear short skirts. Women shouldn't leave drinks unattended. God, they shouldn't dare to get drunk at all.

Instead of that crap, how about:

If a woman is drunk, don't rape her. If a woman is walking alone at night, don't rape her. If a women is drugged and unconscious, don't rape her. If a woman is wearing a short skirt, don't rape her. If a woman is jogging in a park at 5AM, don't rape her. If a woman looks like your ex-girlfriend you're still hung up on, don't rape her. If a woman is asleep in her bed, don't rape her. If a woman is asleep in your bed, don't rape her. If a woman is doing her laundry, don't rape her. If a woman is in a coma, don't rape her. If a woman changes her mind in the middle of or about a particular activity, don't rape her. If a woman has repeatedly refused a certain activity, don't rape her. If a woman is not yet a woman, but a child, don't rape her. If your girlfriend or wife is not in the mood, don't rape her. If your step-daughter is watching TV, don't rape her.

If you break into a house and find a woman there, don't rape her. If your friend thinks it's okay to rape someone, tell him it's not, and that he's not your friend. If your "friend" tells you he raped someone, report him to the police. If your frat-brother or another guy at the party tells you there's an unconscious woman upstairs and it's your turn, don't rape her, call the police and report him as a rapist.

Tell your sons, god-sons, nephews, grandsons, and sons of friends that it's not okay to rape someone.

Don't just tell your women friends how to be safe and avoid rape. Don't imply that she could have avoided it if she'd only done/not done x, y, or z. Don't imply that it's in any way her fault. Don't let silence imply agreement when someone tells you he "got some" with the drunk girl. Don't perpetuate a culture that tells you that you have no control over or responsibility for your actions. You can, too, help yourself.

If you agree, repost it. It's important.

First off I want to wish Mr. Theron a happy birthday. On the 19th my little girl turned 2!! Can you believe it? I sure as hell can't. We have decided that we aren't going to go anywhere on Thanksgiving. SO for the first time in MY LIFE I'm going to spend it at home, and not in a car. It's gonna be nice. We decided not to make a turkey and the huge meal that usually accompanies it but to make a homemade pizza with our kids instead. Actually our kids will be making the pizza with daddy's supervision. We're gonna rent a few movies to watch and of course I'm going to watch the Lions get their asses kicked(which is nothing unusual). So yeah I'm actually excited about Thanksgiving, even though alot of our family members are pissed off about it but oh well. I guess that's all for now. I'll update sometime in the future.

Name 5 of life's simple pleasures that you like most, then pick 5 people to do the same. Try to be original and creative and not to use things that someone else has already used. Tag 5 people on your list. 1.)Being wrapped up safe and secure in my husbands arms 2.)Hugs and Kisses waiting for me from my kids when I get home from work 3.)Working hard to earn my money 4.)My cats playing tag with each other. 5.)Just being with my family Tagging: docspike, dlfreak, warkythechocobo, rpgfreak, piccolo920
How You Are In Love
You take a while to fall in love with someone. Trust takes time. You tend to give more than take in relationships. You tend to get very attached when you're with someone. You want to see your love all the time. You love your partner unconditionally and don't try to make them change. You stay in love for a long time, even if you aren't loved back. When you fall, you fall hard.
How Are You In Love?

Your Birthdate: November 28
You have a Type A personality so big it makes other Type A's shrink away in shame. You never shy away from adversity - and you love to tackle impossible problems. Failure is not an option for you, and more than a few people are put off by your ego. You tend to be controlling, and you hate leaving anything up to chance. Your strength: Your bold approach to life Your weakness: You don't accept help Your power color: Bronze Your power symbol: Pyramid Your power month: October
What Does Your Birth Date Mean?

Last night Mekala was rushed to the ER due to a 105 temp. I was scared shitless!!!!!  We got it down to 101.3 within an hour and a half. They had to do a MRI(whatever) and then they made her do about a dozen or so tests to make sure she didn't suffer any brain damage. She was diagnosed with Strep Throat, so now I get to have loads of fun. However tomorrow night Jeremy and I are actually going out(if Mekala is feeling better) for the first time in 4 months. And that will be a nice break. Anyway I have to go and take her temp so I'll have to add more later.

Today has been a shitty day thus far...Jeremy and I will be fighting as soon as he wakes up with hangover or no hangover because I don't care anymore. I'm so sick of this shit. He got drunk last night for the second time this week and then yesterday he insisted on staying up for 2 1/2 hours laying in bed trying to get me up to tend to our kids. When he could have just gotten his lazy ass out of bed and tended to them himself. But no he needs to annoy the hell out of me and then bitch at me because my kids are up with no supervision. I'm so aggrivated and annoyed with this shit. I'm beyond sick of it, I'm too the point that I'm wondering why we got married in the first place. I love him, I truly do but he can just be so inconsiderate and selfish it's not funny. Why can't he just help out once in awhile? Why can't he get up and tend to the kids for an hour or two? Why is it he gets 48 + hours of sleep a week and I only get 10-16 hours? Why can't he understand where I'm coming from? Am I truly being that undereasonable? I guess so. I'm being a spoiled little brat. Nothing more and nothing less...that's all there is to it I guess.

Yesterday Mr. Phantom came to visit!!!! :P He kicks ass! He's so awesome(even though I had to wait for 2 1/2 hours for him :P) He's also better looking IRL, and his attitude is killer! He loved to squeal his tires, and got me in trouble with the park manager but oh well, shit happens.  My kids are still talking about him, non-stop, as well as my co-workers(who have started a rumor because of it). He probably thinks that I am completely insane(I guess I am in a way) and that my husband is really shy but we're not really. Anyway, he's probably regretting his trip up here but I'm glad he came. It's just shitty that he couldn't have stayed longer. Anyway I'll add more later.

James is coming up here on Saturday!!! :) YEAAAAAAAAAAA!! Actually I'm a little nervous but extremely excited. Hopefully my house won't be completely trashed. But he's going to be here around 9 am and unless I receive a miracle my kids will be up and destroying my house at 7:30am. I guess I'll just have to wait and see, won't I?

We put in a new bathroom floor Monday. It's so nice. We no longer have plywood but really pretty green tiles. My kittens are raising hell, right along with my kids. But both of my girls(kids not cats) are feeling much better. That's such a relief. 

Stacy returned to work today. So far her first day back is going well. She hasn't flipped out, which she thought she would, yet. She has about 4 hours left of her shift but Jeremy's managing so it's no biggie.  They aren't really busy so she's not feeling the normal pressure which is definetly a bonus. I'm afraid that if they were busy she would have snapped by now but she's doing good. Everyone is extremely proud of her. She's still suicidal but now she's found a reason to continue living so hopefully that will keep her from attempting to kill herself. 

I'm so ready to go to work tomorrow. My kids, I love them more than words can describe, but they are driving me mad. I'm ready to strangle Mekala and tie up Jewels. Mekala won't hush up for even a second, she's been talking nonstop since 12:45pm(when I picked her up) and it's now what 6:15ish pm. Man I can't believe how much she can talk. Jewels on the other hand needs to have her hands either tied up or chopped off. She climbed up onto my kitchen counter today and got my wedding jewelry out of the cupboard. She broke my necklace and I'm not sure it can be fixed. I'm praying that it can otherwise I'll be devestated.

Anyway that's all for now. Have fun everyone and I'll update sometime
Sum up your opinion or impression of me in one word, leave it as a comment in this posting, and then post this sentence in your own journal, please

Anyway, this week is starting off shitty as well. My grandfather had to have surgery yesterday. He has cancer and they found a lump that they had to go in and remove so hopefully all went well. I haven't heard from them yet so I'm assuming things went good but I'm not positive. We finally got our new computer hooked up(hence my week off). I am loving every second of it. It's 2 years old but my dad just gave it to us so it is especially useful. Mekala started school yesterday. I have to get her up by 6am every morning in order to meet the bus on time. That's a pain in the ass and somewhat annoying but it's better than having to drive her all the way to school. Now I have to drive 3 miles to her bus stop instead of the 20 miles to school. Yeah, now it won't cost me an arm and leg. Anyway that's all for now I guess.

Nothing but more bad news...Jeremy's father-figure, Mike, was diagnosed with Parkinson's Disease on Friday. Now I'm not exactly sure what that is but I will be doing research on it tonight. Stacy will not be released from the Hospital until noon tomorrow and that's just so that she may go to her mothers funeral. They are undecided as to whether they will make her go for a psyc(sp?) exam. My kids are being horrid little brats that are doing nothing but arguing with each other and me...I'm ready to strangle them. Oh, and for the second time since we've been together my husband is sick! That poor guy doesn't ever get sick but when he does he gets nailed. He has a soar throat, sinus infection, his mouth hurts, a headache from hell and he can't hardle stand up straight because he's nasuea and dizzy. So, yeah for me...lots more fun. Jeremy gets to spend most of tomorrow sleeping and staying in bed. Whereas;I get to run around with my head chopped off to get ready for the funeral. Hopefully my kids will behave for him tomorrow while I'm gone otherwise I'll feel really bad. But that's all for now. Everyone have a great day!!

Well today is another shitty day. It fits in with the rest of my week I guess...I'm not sure how much more I can handle though. I'm pushed beyond my emotional and physical limits at the moment and I still have to make it through Tuesday...at least until after the funeral and the wake...and to top it all off-I'm potty training Jewels, my house is a disaster area, my dad's coming over tomorrow and my niece will be staying the night tomorrow night, and I have to work at both jobs tonight. I have to go to Howard City on Monday and the funeral is on Tuesday...I have way too much shit to do. My laundry is piled up because I've been to depressed to do anything...at least my husband was nice enough to do the dishes Thursday otherwise those would be a mile high by now. Anyway I've gotta go before I keep on bitching and complaining.

I truly apologize for all of my whining this week....

Welll lets see...where should I begin. I will begin by thanking everyone for their condolences and their prays. But now just to prove that things can get worse...and I mean much worse I will begin by telling you about the day my friend had.

My friend Stacy, whom crashed at her cousins house last night, went home at 7am this morning to get ready for school. As she walked into her home she made a very upsetting discovery. She stumbled across her mother and step-fathers bodies. To make things all the worse it was ruled a murder/suicide. Now she's not a very stable person to begin with so I'm really really worried about her. I'm also scared shitless that she will commit suicide herself. She's already feeling extremely guilty about it and it's only getting worse. Right now I just don't know what to do. What really pisses me off is that they waited 11 hours before sedating her...how much fucking sense does that make? seriously, why would they let her go through that? The funeral isn't until Tuesday and some people say that I don't have the right to be there since I didn't know her mom or step-dad but I'm not going for them, I'm going for her. I'm afraid to just sit back and wait for her to come to me because I think she'll kill herself before any of that will ever happen. I won't be able to handle it, nor live with myself if that happens. She's barely 17...with no family left...

I apologize for my tyuping...I can't see very cleartly at this moment.

Well tonight I received a call from my Superior and depending on how things work out I may end up being shipped down to New Orleans come next week. If I do go I'll be down there for 3 to 6 months. I'm more than willing to go, maybe I can even do some good.  Michigan is sending down all Naval Reserves they can spare...although most of us left work in recruiting offices. There's 13 of the 15 going from my office alone. But every little help we can provide is well worth it. I'll let everyone know what's going on come Monday morning.

I also learned today(well about an hour ago @ 10pm) that 4 of my relatives didn't make it. I'm upset and sadden but it's not affecting me the way it would if it was someone closer. I didn't know them that well, but still I did know them. My kids aren't affected by the news at all, they had never met them. It was my Cousin David and his family(Wife Nikko, daughter Megan and son David Jr.) His daughter was almost 4(her birthday was 2 days away) and his son was 22 months old. They shouldn't have died!!! There was no reason for them to die.

Well I'm done for tonight...I think I'm going to cry now and then get my thoughts together and get things around in case I get shipped out Monday. I'll keep everyone uptodate...

Well I got my eyes checked out and they haven't gotten much worse...if I didn't want a new perscription I wouldn't need to get it however...my stigmatism in my left eye has gotten worse so it would probably be a good idea...once we come up with the money. I can't believe how much it is going to cost me to get lenses for my frames. So far the cheapest I found them to be is $218.45 and that's getting a 15% discount since I have medicaid. I have only 2 more places to check before deciding on where to get them from. One of the places left to check is the place where I originally got them from...I'm almost positive that they will be cheaper there since in 2001 I had to replace both frame and lenses(thanks to Mekala) and it only cost me $159.00...with no warranty and no insurance so...hopefully!!!*crosses fingers just in case*

Anyway my kids are screaming their heads off because I'm mean and am making them take naps but they'll get over it. I'm a little worried since for the first time in almost 4 years my uncle Bill is trying to get ahold of me. He called while I was gone but Jeremy didn't realize who it was and didn't answer it. He lives in Pheonix, AZ...and I have no idea as to why he would be calling me unless it's bad news...so I'm more than a little worried...I don't know how any of my family is doing and I haven't heard anything about them. I have 3 aunts and 2 uncles that live in the New Orleans area and a cousin that lives in Jackson, Mississippi so hopefully all is well with them.  If not I'm sure I'll find out soon enough. 

But I guess that's enough for now. I'm sure I'll update as soon as I talk to Uncle Bill.

Well I got some good news today...someone will be home on the 20th...YEAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!! Anyway, I get to go and get new glasses today...well actually new lenses sense I happen to love my frames. It's only taken me 7 years(just over) to get them but...it's all good. I'm just so happy right now that it's not even funny. I feel like I'm flying. Oh yeah another miracle that happened today...My husband just got out of bed!!! That is so unusual, it had me worried for a minute as I thought I had missed my appointment. He's only up 5 1/2 hours early...Oh well no complaining on my part. So for now that is all, I'm going to spend some time with my husband and my kids. Don't worry I'll be back online after 2:30ish. Have fun

One little compliment can make you feel amazing. So give me a compliment, anything in the entire world, even that my shoelaces are pretty. Put this in your journal. And once you get some comments, put that entry in a memory or tag and when you are feeling down, just go to that entry and this will remind that you're not so bad in other people's eyes after all.

Comments are going to be screened so none of you will know if I'm uber-popular and get over 100 comments on this or a total loser who doesn't get any.

well where to begin...I got drunk last night for the first time in almost a year...it was great fun. My co-worker and really good friend came over and hung out for quiet awhile after work. I only got 2 hours of sleep last night because of it but amazingly enough Jeremy actually let me take an hour nap before he left for work so I'm a little better off than I was...not much but a little.

The kittens are doing really well, although they aren't as playful as my husband would like them to be. They are however, extremely lovey dovey. His favorite is Smokey and mine is Oreo...Jewels loves her kitten, she won't leave her alone half the time but Oreo doesn't care so it's all good. Smokey basically hides most of the afternoon and comes out at night to lounge around. They had fleas when we got them and we are working on getting rid of them, however they will probably get at least 3 more treatments just in case. 

My kids are being brats like usual. Jewels punched her sister and actually gave her a black and blue eye...I couldn't believe it. Yesterday she bit Mekala...I don't know what I'm going to do with her but we gotta figure something out and quick. Mekala is becoming a whiner and tattler from hell...and of course she can't rat her sister out when she really needs to...just when she wants to and it's a minor thing. But oh well...more shit to figure out and hopefully get corrected soon. Mekala starts school Sept. 12 so I know that she'll straighten her act up soon enough, otherwise she doesn't get to go.

But I guess I posted enough for now so I'll let your poor eyes and head have a break from all of my bitching. Take care everyone

My baby had her well-child check up today and all is well...which is funny since she won't quit crying. I don't even know why she's crying now...she has no teeth coming in, no temp, no part of her body that hurts(if she does she won't tell me about it), she didn't hurt herself. So I don't know what her problem is. I doubt she's still tired since she's only been up for a couple of hours and she woke up on her own so...I don't know. We just discovered that our car has a flat tire...and of course we don't have a spare because that would just make perfect sense. Anyway I have to get ready to go to work so have fun everyone and I'll talk to you Aug 7th sometime a.m.

Believe it or not this post will have nothing to do with my family...instead it will be all about a friend of mine. And yes, I will be doing lots and lots of bitching so you have been warned. This is about my friend, and they know who they are!!!!

I have a friend who needs to be smacked upside the head a good dozen times or more. He's stubborn, pig-headed and I jsut really want to hurt him. He doesn't take care of himself and yes I know it's difficult but GODDAMMIT YOU NEED TO! You aren't going to do anyone any good if you don't. Yes, I'm sure I'm sounding like your mother but guess what to damn bad! If you were standing in front of me right now I'd knock you out and throw you in a bed, lock you in your room and then after 5 hours I might consider letting you out. I don't care what you say about why you don't take care of yourself. YOU KNOW BETTER!!!! Yes, you need to help other people but you need to tend to yourself first. And, if you get hurt because of it I'm going to hunt your scrawny ass down and kick your ass!! Quit being so damn hard on yourself for every little thing...

I know I'm a bitch but you'll deal with it or you'll ignore me. But sometimes I just want to scream at you and beat you senseless so that way you might get the point. But I'm not kidding, you had better take care of yourself.  I will find out if you don't and I will hurt you.

We went and got the new kittens tonight. We were only going to allow them to get one, but daddy fell in love with one and the girls fell in love with another.  So yeah...we have two of them. A pure long-haired grey named Smokey and a black and white short-haired named Oreo. The girls got to name them. Jewels named Smokey and Mekala named Oreo. At least the names are fitting. Now we have to run to the store and get another collar and a few new toys. The kittens are both 2 1/2 months old and so very lovable. It's nice to have them around. They aren't shy nor are they scared when my kids are chasing them around. But I've gotta go for now so I'll update later

Jeremy and I are taking the girls out to eat tonight. It's highly unusual for us to go out for dinner so I'm kinda excited...even if it is to Pizza Hut(which was my choice). The girls are being a pain in the butt...they probably are sick of being in the house since they haven't been able to play outside in the past couple of days. But they'll be able to play outside tonight so I'm sure they will straighten up. Anyway it's time for me to go and tend to my kids...Have fun.
